podcasts.title: Lex Fridman Podcast
podcasts.description: Long-form interviews with AI researchers, scientists, and tech leaders exploring intelligence, consciousness, and the future.

podcasts.title: Dwarkesh Podcast
podcasts.description: Deep-dive interviews with top AI researchers and technologists on the future of intelligence and civilization.

podcasts.title: Fireship
podcasts.description: Fast-paced tech news and tutorials. Known for '100 seconds' explainers and weekly AI news roundups.

podcasts.title: Two Minute Papers
podcasts.description: Bite-sized breakdowns of cutting-edge AI research papers with visual demos and clear explanations.

podcasts.title: Andrej Karpathy
podcasts.description: In-depth technical lectures on neural networks, LLMs, and building AI systems from a former OpenAI/Tesla AI lead.

podcasts.title: All-In Podcast
podcasts.description: Four tech investors discuss AI, startups, economics, and politics with insider perspectives on Silicon Valley.

podcasts.title: Matt Wolfe
podcasts.description: Weekly AI news roundups, tool reviews, and tutorials covering the latest in generative AI and practical applications.

podcasts.title: Matthew Berman
podcasts.description: AI news, model reviews, and hands-on demos of the latest LLMs, open-source models, and AI tools.

podcasts.title: DeepLearning.AI
podcasts.description: Educational content from Andrew Ng's team — short courses, event talks, and AI explainers for practitioners.

podcasts.title: Y Combinator
podcasts.description: Startup advice, founder interviews, and AI-focused discussions from the world's top startup accelerator.

podcasts.title: AI Explained
podcasts.description: Thoughtful analysis of AI capabilities, benchmarks, and safety research with careful attention to nuance.

podcasts.title: TheAIGRID
podcasts.description: Daily AI news coverage and analysis of breakthroughs, model releases, and industry trends.

podcasts.title: Moonshots with Peter Diamandis
podcasts.description: Conversations about exponential technologies, AI's impact on humanity, and the future of abundance.

podcasts.title: Yannic Kilcher
podcasts.description: Detailed technical paper reviews and ML news from a researcher's perspective, covering arxiv papers in depth.

podcasts.title: Wes Roth
podcasts.description: AI news analysis and commentary on AGI progress, AI safety, and the societal implications of artificial intelligence.

podcasts.title: Machine Learning Street Talk
podcasts.host: Tim Scarfe, Keith Duggar, Yannic Kilcher
podcasts.description: In-depth technical discussions and interviews with leading ML researchers on cutting-edge topics.

podcasts.title: No Priors
podcasts.description: AI-focused podcast by top tech investors featuring founders and researchers building the AI future.

podcasts.title: a16z
podcasts.description: Tech and AI insights from one of Silicon Valley's most influential VC firms — talks, demos, and founder stories.

podcasts.title: Latent Space
podcasts.description: The AI engineer podcast — deep technical interviews with builders shipping AI products and infrastructure.

podcasts.title: 3Blue1Brown
podcasts.description: Beautiful visual explanations of mathematics, neural networks, and the concepts underlying modern AI.

podcasts.title: David Shapiro
podcasts.description: Thoughtful discussions on AGI, cognitive architectures, AI alignment, and building autonomous AI systems.

podcasts.title: AI Jason
podcasts.description: Practical AI tutorials, tool reviews, and guides for building AI-powered applications and automations.

podcasts.title: Cognitive Revolution
podcasts.description: Interviews with AI researchers and builders exploring the cutting edge of AI capabilities and implications.
